Categorize this IT Ticket:

access to thursday pm re hi order migrate rights best regards thursday pm hello help found sites old owner owner also please note has created different structure were imported kind regards analyst ext hub thursday re hi please link old folders migrated never content best regards wednesday pm hello please note granted owner rights site kind regards analyst ext hub pm re migration how information hi thread she helping pease her migrating thank thursday pm migration how information hello move beyond beta phase excited transition site which launched st moved site pulse old order complete transition please upload files location within next couple days help prepared easy guides site scroll next two weeks files old after old become two weeks means unable change upload files download moment after date proceed closing down find guides community useful encounter issues let kindly note deadline site file transfer october enjoy browsing looking forward thank kind regards ext hub
